alert.note: Alert for Antelope; Boone; Madison; Platte; Stanton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 1:22AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Madison, Platte, southeastern Antelope, northeastern Boone and southwestern Stanton Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 122 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles northeast of Petersburg to 3 miles northwest of Newman Grove to 6 miles south of Lindsay to 4 miles northwest of Silver Creek. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Newman Grove around 125 AM CDT. Duncan and Monroe around 135 AM CDT. Tilden and Humphrey around 140 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Columbus, Madison, Battle Creek, Platte Center, Meadow Grove, Creston and Lakeview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
